Function Reference¶

ossvt.upstream.latest(p)[source]¶

Using our list from package() or packages() we extract data to make the needed URL request, we then take the regex to pull the latest software version

ossvt.upstream.package(pkg)[source]¶

Return a list of one package found in pkg_dir with given pkg name, the configuration will contain needed regular expression and URL to grab latest software version number

ossvt.upstream.packages()[source]¶

Return a list of all packages found in pkg_dir, the configuration will contain needed regular expressions and URLs to grab latest software version number
